RESETPASSWORD.TITLE: Forgot Password
RESETPASSWORD.SUCCESS: We have sent you an email with reset instructions.

LANDING.TITLE: Welcome to the Talent Catalog
LANDING.INTRO: Landing page - the what and the why
LANDING.PARA1: Welcome to the Talent Catalog! This site is an online platform designed to capture the skills and talents of refugees and other displaced people.  Registration in the Talent Catalog is free of charge. This site is available in both Arabic and English.
LANDING.PARA2: Talent Beyond Boundaries’ (TBB) mission is to open international visa pathways for refugees and other forcibly displaced people to use their skills and talents as a route towards restored self-reliance and safety. TBB is a nonprofit organization with a cooperation agreement with UNHCR. We link those who are displaced by conflict with jobs in countries around the world where their skills are needed and and support them to overcome barriers to migration. Anyone is welcome to create a profile on the Talent Catalog; by sharing information about your employment history and skills, you contribute to demonstrating the breadth and depth of talent among displaced people. However, at this time, TBB’s program is only available to displaced people currently based in Lebanon and Jordan for positions in Australia, Canada, and the United Kingdom. We will continue to update this site, our website, and our social media with any changes to our program. You can learn more about Talent Beyond Boundaries at talentbeyondboundaries.org.
LANDING.PARA3:
The Talent Catalog is secure. TBB will use the information you share to identify potential employment opportunities abroad. TBB cannot guarantee employment, and will only contact you if an employer expresses interest in your profile.

Please read our Privacy Policy for more information about how your data will used (www.talentbeyondboundaries.org/s/TBB-Talent-Catalog-Privacy-Policy.pdf). By registering with the Talent Catalog you are giving TBB consent to use your data in accordance with the Privacy Policy.

DRAFT.EXPLANATION: You haven't finished your registration. Please click the button below to continue.

PENDING.EXPLANATION:
Thank you for completing your profile on the Talent Catalog! TBB will only contact you if an employer expresses interest in your profile. 


You can update your profile with additional information at any time. We recommend you continuously update your profile with any new information relevant to your professional experience or qualifications, as well as update any changes in your contact information.

ACTIVE.EXPLANATION:
Thank you for completing your profile on the Talent Catalog! TBB will only contact you if an employer expresses interest in your profile. 


 You can update your profile with additional information at any time. We recommend you continuously update your profile with any new information relevant to your professional experience or qualifications, as well as update any changes in your contact information.

INCOMPLETE.EXPLANATION: You have not finished your Talent Catalog profile. Your profile cannot currently be considered for international employment opportunities. Please look back through your profile and add additional information. Remember to 'submit' your profile at the end.

EMPLOYED.EXPLANATION: Thank you for completing your profile on the Talent Catalog!

INACTIVE.EXPLANATION: Your profile did not contain enough information to be included in the Talent Catalog

INELIGIBLE.EXPLANATION: Your profile is not eligible to be included in the Talent Catalog. Learn more about our eligibility requirements in the link below, or review your profile.

HEADER.EXPLANATION: If possible please provide this response in English so it can be more easily reviewed by our team.

LANDING.TITLE: Let's get started
LANDING.PARA1:
In order to be considered for international employment opportunities, you can create a profile on the Talent Catalog. We encourage you to share as much detail as possible about your work experience when creating your profile. Please note that your registration is not complete until you click 'Submit' at the end of the process. It may take between 15 min - 1 hour to complete a full profile.


Please click the following link for tips on how to complete a detailed profile:: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IZNN4y7nT9M
LANDING.PARA2: Talent Beyond Boundaries will use the information you share to identify relevant international employment opportunities, and may share your skills profile with interested employers. TBB will not share your identifying details with any other parties without your consent. TBB does publicly share anonymized, aggregate data about all registrants in the Talent Catalog.

LABEL.COUNTRYID: Country you are currently living in
LABEL.YEAROFARRIVAL: What year did you arrive in this country?
LABEL.EXTERNALID: ID assigned to you by the organisation other than TBB or UNHCR  who is currently helping you. For example, your United States Citizenship and Immigration Services ID.
LABEL.REGISTEREDWITHUN: Are you registered with UNHCR or UNRWA?
LABEL.UNHCRCONSENT: Do you consent to TBB notifying UNHCR that you have created a Talent Catalog profile?

NOTE.UNHCRREGISTERED: You do not need to be registered with the UN to be eligible for TBB.
NOTE.UNHCRCONSENT: This will assist us to coordinate possible employment and migration opportunities for you.

LABEL.OCCUPATION: What is the main field that you have skills in?
LABEL.YEARSEXPERIENCE: How many years of work experience do you have in this field?
LABEL.DISCLAIMER: Do not include years spent studying in this occupation
